title: Effective Utilization Strategies for Multimedia-Based University English Learning Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Targeting pre-service/in-service teachers, limited technological environment (smartphone-centric), summative assessment-focused

learning_goals: Learners form a self-directed learning habit of using multimedia English learning tools at least three times per week within four weeks.
Learners achieve a 20% or higher improvement in English reading and listening proficiency assessments by the 8th week after using the learning tool.
By the 12th week, learners can present teaching method improvement plans to peer teachers based on their experience using the learning tool.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
